synopsis.text: For Aikawa Ayumu, being a typical high school student takes a drastic turn when he is murdered and then resurrected as a zombie by the enigmatic necromancer, Eucliwood Hellscythe. As he navigates his newfound undead existence, Ayumu is thrust into a world teeming with magical girls and vampire ninjas. To complicate matters, he unintentionally absorbs the magical powers of a lively magical girl named Haruna, who then tasks Ayumu with battling the sinister creatures known as Megalos in her stead. With his unnatural immortality, Ayumu must juggle the challenges of high school, hunting down his own killer, and contending with the bizarre supernatural world that now surrounds him in Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
